org.cyclops.integratedterminals.api.terminalstorage

Interface ITerminalStorageTabClient<S extends ITerminalStorageSlot>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TerminalStorageTabIngredientComponentClient, TerminalStorageTabIngredientComponentItemStackCraftingClient

    public interface ITerminalStorageTabClient<S extends ITerminalStorageSlot>
    A client-side terminal storage tab.

      • getName

        net.minecraft.util.ResourceLocation getName()
        Returns:
        The unique tab name, as inherited from ITerminalStorageTab.getName().

      • getTabSettingsName

        default net.minecraft.util.ResourceLocation getTabSettingsName()
        Returns:
        The tab name that will be used to store TerminalStorageState settings inside a tab. This can be used to modify in what tab certain settings are stored.

      • getIcon

        net.minecraft.item.ItemStack getIcon()
        Returns:
        An icon for the tab.

        Returns:
        A tooltip when hovering over the icon.

        Parameters:

        The active filter.

      • setInstanceFilter

        void setInstanceFilter(int channel,
                       java.lang.String filter)
        Set a filter for instances in slots.
        Parameters:
        filter - A string-based filter, which could be a regex.
        channel - The channel to filter in.

      • getSlots

        java.util.List<S> getSlots(int channel,
                           int offset,
                           int limit)
        Get a subset of slots.
        Parameters:
        channel - A channel id.
        offset - A slot offset.
        limit - A slot limit.
        Returns:
        A list of slots, can be empty.

      • handleClick

        boolean handleClick(net.minecraft.inventory.container.Container container,
                    int channel,
                    int hoveringStorageSlot,
                    int mouseButton,
                    boolean hasClickedOutside,
                    boolean hasClickedInStorage,
                    int hoveredContainerSlot)
        Called when a mouse click happens in a gui.
        Parameters:
        container - The active container.
        channel - The active channel.
        hoveringStorageSlot - The storage slot id that is being hovered. -1 if none.
        mouseButton - The mouse button.
        hasClickedOutside - If the player has clicked outside the gui.
        hasClickedInStorage - If the player has clicked inside the storage space. This can be true even if the storage slot is -1.
        hoveredContainerSlot - The container slot id that is being hovered. -1 if none.
        Returns:
        If further click processing should stop.

      • handleScroll

        boolean handleScroll(net.minecraft.inventory.container.Container container,
                     int channel,
                     int hoveringStorageSlot,
                     double delta,
                     boolean hasClickedOutside,
                     boolean hasClickedInStorage,
                     int hoveredContainerSlot)
        Called when a mouse scroll happens in a gui.
        Parameters:
        container - The active container.
        channel - The active channel.
        hoveringStorageSlot - The storage slot id that is being hovered. -1 if none.
        delta - The scroll delta.
        hasClickedOutside - If the player has clicked outside the gui.
        hasClickedInStorage - If the player has clicked inside the storage space. This can be true even if the storage slot is -1.
        hoveredContainerSlot - The container slot id that is being hovered. -1 if none.
        Returns:
        If further click processing should stop.

                                   net.minecraft.inventory.container.Slot slot)
        Check if we can drag over the current slot with an active instance.
        Parameters:
        channel - The active channel.
        slot - The slot to drag over.
        Returns:
        If we can drag over the slot.

      • computeDraggingQuantity

        int computeDraggingQuantity(java.util.Set<net.minecraft.inventory.container.Slot> dragSlots,
                            int dragMode,
                            net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack,
                            int quantity)
        Calculate the quantity that will be added to the given stack based on the drag mode and the given list of slots.
        Parameters:
        dragSlots - The list of slots to drag over.
        dragMode - The drag mode.
        stack - The stack to calculate the quantity for.
        quantity - The available quantity to drag.
        Returns:
        The quantity that will be added.

      • dragIntoSlot

        int dragIntoSlot(net.minecraft.inventory.container.Container container,
                 int channel,
                 net.minecraft.inventory.container.Slot slot,
                 int quantity,
                 boolean simulate)
        Drag the given quantity into the given slot with the currently active instance.
        Parameters:
        container - The active container.
        channel - The active channel.
        slot - The slot to drag into.
        quantity - The quantity to insert.
        simulate - If insertion should only be simulated.
        Returns:
        The quantity that was inserted.
